comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Oh dear :( I think Trove was offline for a bit last night. It looks as though ESMERALDA was quite successful throughout the 1890s, however I would say the image most likely refers to 1895. This 1896 article refers to a Sydney race won by ESMERALDA (for a race held in 1895): bit.ly/TZEKax And this headline: bit.ly/RVjna6
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] Thanks - the January 1895 date looks good.
